JJK.KenjakuGeneDef.label: Kenjaku's Possession
JJK.KenjakuGeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene possess the ability to transfer their consciousness between bodies, a technique perfected by the ancient sorcerer Kenjaku.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Allows the carrier to possess other pawns, transferring their consciousness and traits.
Possessed pawns gain the Psychopath trait and have a chance to gain the Bloodlust trait.
